snippet.title: Night of the Full Moon - Blessing of Apothecary Trailer
snippet.description:
The popular roguelike card RPG returns with a new expansion! The Diary of Little Red Riding Hood features new additions to the story, new classes, new gameplay modes, and more!

Night of the Full Moon will be published by Giant Games, the US subsidiary of premier games developer and publisher Giant Network Group based out of Shanghai.
